entry.title: https://github.com/Azure/Microsoft-Defender-for-Cloud
entry.content: Welcome to the Microsoft Defender for Cloud community repository

entry.title: https://github.com/ChrisTitusTech/winutil
entry.content: Chris Titus Tech's Windows Utility - Install Programs, Tweaks, Fixes, and Updates

entry.title: https://github.com/Micke-K/IntuneManagement
entry.content: Copy, export, import, delete, document and compare policies and profiles in Intune and Azure with PowerShell script and WPF UI. Import ADMX files and registry settings with ADMX ingestion. View and edit PowerShell script.

entry.title: https://github.com/Raphire/Win11Debloat
entry.content: A simple, easy to use PowerShell script to remove pre-installed apps from Windows, disable telemetry, remove Bing from Windows search as well as perform various other changes to declutter and improve your Windows experience. This script works for both Windows 10 and Windows 11.

entry.title: https://github.com/cisagov/ScubaGear
entry.content: Automation to assess the state of your M365 tenant against CISA's baselines

entry.title: https://github.com/dartraiden/NVIDIA-patcher
entry.content: Adds 3D acceleration support for P106-090 / P106-100 / P104-100 / P104-101 / P102-100 / CMP 30HX / CMP 40HX / CMP 50HX / CMP 70HX / CMP 90HX / CMP 170HX mining cards as well as RTX 3060 3840SP, RTX 3080 Ti 20 GB, RTX 4070 10 GB, and L40 ES.

entry.title: https://github.com/microsoft/AL
entry.content: Home of the Dynamics 365 Business Central AL Language extension for Visual Studio Code. Used to track issues regarding the latest version of the AL compiler and developer tools available in the Visual Studio Code Marketplace or as part of the AL Developer Preview builds for Dynamics 365 Business Central.

entry.title: https://github.com/microsoft/Microsoft365DSC
entry.content: Manages, configures, extracts and monitors Microsoft 365 tenant configurations

entry.title: https://github.com/microsoft/navcontainerhelper
entry.content: Official Microsoft repository for BcContainerHelper, a PowerShell module, which makes it easier to work with Business Central Containers on Docker.

entry.title: https://github.com/microsoft/winget-pkgs
entry.content: The Microsoft community Windows Package Manager manifest repository

entry.title: https://github.com/microsoftgraph/microsoft-graph-docs-contrib
entry.content: Documentation for the Microsoft Graph REST API

entry.title: https://github.com/microsoftgraph/powershell-intune-samples
entry.content: This repository of PowerShell sample scripts show how to access Intune service resources. They demonstrate this by making HTTPS RESTful API requests to the Microsoft Graph API from PowerShell.
